title.rendered: Bloomberg Reports: Qatari Cash in NYC Meets Hong Kong Money to Back Wealth Firm

excerpt.rendered: Alvarium (formerly LJ Partnership), a London-based wealth manager armed with money from the Persian Gulf, is targeting global expansion.
